snippet.title: PSX Longplay [052] Ridge Racer Revolution
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played By: Deskawa

This game is the continuation of the series on PSX but it isn't Ridge Racer 2. That game only appeared on arcades but it's just the original Ridge Racer with some new options and music. Ridge Racer Revolution only takes the music from that game and the rest is 100% original. It consists on 3 circuits that share the starting/finish line, and of course there is the mirror mode with increased difficulty and Time Trials were you race against the bosses. This game isn't too well considered between the fans of the series, most probably because of the new controls, that made drifting quite a bit punishing.

While the recording is a bit smoother than the previous Ridge Racer, there are some slowdowns here and there because of some emulator issues (I should have checked others before recording :/), aside from that, there aren't any big problems. The walkthrough consists on 9 races, the 3 original circuits, the mirror versions and 3 time Time Trials so you can see the bosses.

03:21 Novice - Drive U 2 Dancing

07:52 Intermediate - Rotterdam Nation 94

14:07 Expert - Over the Highway

22:38 Intermediate Mirror - Dat Dan Day

27:42 Expert Mirror - Grip

32:48 Novice Mirror - Feeling Over Remix

39:59 Novice Mirror (against 13th car/ Black Lamborgini) - Maximum Zone 

44:41 Intermediate Mirror (against the Devil Kid/Racing Kid) - Rare Hero 2 

49:47 Expert Mirror (against White Angel with the other "lord of techno" ^^U) - Lords of Techno -
